title: Chapter 2: Speech Recognition and Natural Language Understanding
description: Building on the previous chapter's introduction to integrating GPT models, this chapter delves deeper into the foundational technologies that enable conversational robots: Speech Recognition (also known as Automatic Speech Recognition - ASR) and Natural Language Understanding (NLU). These components are critical for transforming raw audio into actionable intent, forming the bedrock of human-robot dialogue. Without accurate ASR, the robot cannot "hear" the human, and without robust NLU, it cannot "understand" their meaning.
